title: Mobile-Based Remote Laboratory Mathematics Education: Practical Learning Program for Working Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and basic smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Providing remote experimental environments for mathematical modeling and real-world problem-solving. Modular structure designed to accommodate time constraints of working learners

learning_goals: Learners develop the ability to control remote lab equipment via mobile interfaces and analyze mathematical variables
Learners strengthen their capacity to convert real-world problems (e.g., budget allocation, spatial planning) into mathematical models and interpret experimental results
Learners immediately apply learning content and experience error-correction processes through weekly formative assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
